title: internal compiler error: missed typecheck
body:
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?
package main
import "fmt"
const dow = "\000\003\002\005\000\003\005\001\004\006\002\004"
func main() {
	fmt.Println(int(dow[4]))
}


2. What is the full compiler output?
missed typecheck [2ad1b3aa4d00]
.   LITERAL-I0 u(1) a(1) x(0+0) uint8
prog.go:5: internal compiler error: missed typecheck


3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)
6g version release.r60.3 9516
